data.enText: the movement or sound of the heart as it sends blood around the body
an important feature of sth, that is responsible for making it what it is

data.chText: 这位候选人说他了解加利福尼亚州的西班牙语裔美国人社区的特点。
data.enText: The candidate said that he understood the heartbeat of the Hispanic community in California.
very quickly, without thinking about it

data.chText: 如果能找到另外一份工作，我马上就走。
data.enText: If I was offered another job, I'd leave in a heartbeat.
very quickly, without thinking about it

data.chText: 如果能找到另外一份工作，我马上就走。
data.enText: If I was offered another job, I'd leave in a heartbeat.

tr: an animating or vital unifying force
example: New York is the commercial heartbeat of America

tr: the rhythmic contraction and expansion of the arteries with each beat of the heart
example: he could feel the beat of her heart

tr: a very short time (as the time it takes the eye to blink or the heart to beat)
example: if I had the chance I'd do it in a flash

value.def: Your heartbeat is the regular movement of your heart as it pumps blood around your body.

example.ex: Your baby's heartbeat will be monitored continuously.
example.tran: 宝宝的心搏将会受到持续监控。

value.def: A heartbeat is one of the movements of your heart.

example.ex: Smoking could lead to irregular heartbeats.
